Potion, Cure Light Wounds.description: A small vial containing a cure light wounds spell in liquid form. The vial is 2 inches tall and 1 inch wide, containing one ounce of liquid. Drinking this as a standard action will heal 1d8 + 1 damage and provoke an Attack of Opportunity.

Potion, Cure Moderate Wounds.description: A small vial containing a cure moderate wounds spell in liquid form. The vial is 2 inches tall and 1 inch wide, containing one ounce of liquid. Drinking this as a standard action will heal 2d8 + 3 damage and provoke an Attack of Opportunity.

Potion, Cure Serious Wounds.description: A small vial containing a cure serious wounds spell in liquid form. The vial is 2 inches tall and 1 inch wide, containing one ounce of liquid. Drinking this as a standard action will heal 3d8 + 5 damage and provoke an Attack of Opportunity.
